system.requirements: Tier 3: Survival +10 or Operate (Any), Tech-Use. Aptitudes: Perception, Tech
system.effect: Once per round, character can add +20 to an Operate Test (or Survival Test if riding a living steed), however if they fail the test by 4+ Degrees of Failiure, must immediately roll 1d5 for Motive System Critical Hit effects. If riding a living mount instead roll 1d on Impact Critical Effects (Leg).
